content: each mitt in half sideways and using your tapestry needle and mattress stitch sew up the entire 2x2 rib portion of each mitt then beginning from the top sew up the garter portion of each mitt for 16 20 22 24 26 30 30 30 34 row leaving the rest of the garter section to be used as a thumb hole weave in all ends to finish a few helpful tutorials for the mattress stitch can be found here mattress stitch on stockinette https //www youtube com/watch v=nj7kegutljm mattress stitch on garter https //www youtube com/watch v=p5grhi-pgeg for pattern support contact alanna@blackcatknitco com www blackcatknittingcompany com ravelry blackcatknitco instagram blackcatknitco © alanna penk 2020
